column4: ok, can you explain to me how to install ffmpeg? does it convert from AVI to WMA?
There is a free player for PDA/PPCs that will play regular .avi, mpg, ect.
Gimme a sec to check the name.
but I have win mobile on!
me too.
ok then of it works great!
The player name is tcpmp
Download and install the codec packs too and you'lle be all set. :)
eadg, I will for sure install this one, but first I have to install windows :-/
can you lead me please? first do you know where is the installation of that ffmpg program?
and EADG how to get codecs
Windows for what? to xfer data to ppc?
ffmpg or tcpmp? ffmpg is for linux, tcpmp is player for ppc
what are these plugins for windows mobile?
the codecs for tcpmp are on the tcpmp website... with tcpmp installed you shouldn't have to convert your videos (thats what ffmpeg is for)
sec, lemme find site.
http://picard.exceed.hu/tcpmp/0.71/ EADG
what are these plug-ins?
should I dl all of them?
Plugins are just some extra bits for tcpmp... for playing uncommon files types.
start with the base program first.
I would like to install converting tools anyway because I would like to have it soon on my PDA and can not set up my windows now
We should take this offline, not really linux related... /join #EADG and I'll help ya out.
